attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After much news about hospital car parking charges, they are penalising the sick and preventing many families to stop or cut back on visiting loved ones. They should be scrapped or if they are necessary to lower the hourly rates substanstially

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
